resources.string:
"Instructions for injecting dependencies into Composables using Hilt.

## Singleton Injection

Singleton-scoped instances are accessible from any Composable.

Example instance of `Foo` from a `@Singleton` component:

```
%s
```

```kotlin
@Composable
inline fun <reified T : Any> rememberSingletonEntryPoint(): T { /* … */ }
```

## Custom Composable Scope

Dependencies can be scoped to a Composable.

Example instance of `Bar` from a `@ComposableScoped` component:

```
%s
```

```kotlin
@Scope
annotation class ComposableScoped

@ComposableScoped
@DefineComponent(parent = ActivityComponent::class)
interface ComposableComponent

@Composable
inline fun <reified T : Any> rememberComposableEntryPoint(): T { /* … */ }
```
"
